rebalanceWithdrawalLimit(address,address.details: This function can only be called by the rebalancer

params.newLimit_: The new withdrawal limit to be set
params.user_: The address of the user for which to set the withdrawal limit

setWithdrawalLimit(address,address,uint2.details: This function can only be called by team multisig

params.newLimit_: The new withdrawal limit to be set
params.user_: The address of the user for which to set the withdrawal limit

LogRebalanceWithdrawalLimit(address,addr.notice: emitted when rebalancer successfully changes the withdrawal limit

LogSetWithdrawalLimit(address,address,ui.notice: emitted when multisig successfully changes the withdrawal limit

rebalanceWithdrawalLimit(address,address.notice: updates the withdrawal limit for a specific user at a dex

setWithdrawalLimit(address,address,uint2.notice: Sets the withdrawal limit for a specific user at a dex
